name: Asteroid Mayhem
description:
This is our Submission for the Brackeys Game  Jam2021.2 with "Let there be chaos" as the theme.
In this game you have to survive an anomaly in the solar system. You have a laser to destroy asteroids and some fuel to escape, try catching crystals to gain fuel. and dot get too close from the sun!!!

Control the ship with:
Pitch: W-S;
Yaw: A-D;
Roll: Q-E;
Throttle: R-F;
Fire Laser: Left Shift or Left Mouse Button;
Laser Pointer: Mouse Position;
Pause : Escape;

Made by:
-Gonçalo Vieira;
-Nicolas Franza;
-Pavel Alexandrovsky;
-Jason W;

Don't forget to rate our submission and leave a comment so we can check yours if we didn't already
